code: export async function listOrgs(){const res=await fetch('/v1/orgs');if(!res.ok)throw new Error("failed to list orgs: ".concat(res.status));const body=await res.json();return body.orgs;}export async function createOrg(name,tag){const res=await fetch('/v1/orgs',{method:'POST',headers:{'content-type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({name,tag})});if(!res.ok)throw new Error("failed to create org: ".concat(res.status));return res.json();}
